trans-unit.source: Displays user interface dialogs that allow you to select and view X.509 certificates.
This class cannot be inherited.

Use the methods of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI> class to present user interface dialogs that display detailed information about an X.509 certificate or allow users to select one or more certificates from a collection of X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez les méthodes de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI> classe à présent dialogues d’interface utilisateur qui affiche des informations détaillées sur un certificat X.509 ou permettre aux utilisateurs de sélectionner un ou plusieurs certificats à partir d’une collection de certificats X.509.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple de code suivant montre comment afficher des boîtes de dialogue interface utilisateur pour sélectionner et afficher les certificats X.509.

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.
This method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode affiche une boîte de dialogue des informations détaillées sur le certificat X.509 spécifié.

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: La boîte de dialogue inclut des boutons pour l’installation ou la copie du certificat.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to display.
Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A> method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A> méthode affiche une boîte de dialogue des informations détaillées sur le certificat X.509 spécifié.

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: La boîte de dialogue inclut des boutons pour l’installation ou la copie du certificat.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple de code suivant montre comment afficher des boîtes de dialogue interface utilisateur pour sélectionner et afficher les certificats X.509.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is invalid.
The X.509 certificate to display.
A handle to the parent window to use for the display dialog.
Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain using a handle to a parent window.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A> method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.DisplayCertificate%2A> méthode affiche une boîte de dialogue des informations détaillées sur le certificat X.509 spécifié.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to nest dialog boxes that display certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode peut être utilisée pour imbriquer des boîtes de dialogue qui affichent des informations de certificat.

trans-unit.source: The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.
trans-unit.target: La boîte de dialogue inclut des boutons pour l’installation ou la copie du certificat.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is invalid.
requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiert une confiance totale pour l’appelant immédiat.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Ce membre ne peut pas être utilisé par le code de confiance partielle ou transparent.

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.
Use this method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez cette méthode si vous avez besoin aux utilisateurs de sélectionner manuellement les certificats X.509 à l’aide d’une boîte de dialogue.

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Si aucune interaction utilisateur n’est requise, utilisez le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
The title of the dialog box.
A descriptive message to guide the user.
The message is displayed in the dialog box.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag" /> values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.
Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A> method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A> méthode si vous avez besoin aux utilisateurs de sélectionner manuellement les certificats X.509 à l’aide d’une boîte de dialogue.

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Si aucune interaction utilisateur n’est requise, utilisez le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple de code suivant montre comment afficher des boîtes de dialogue interface utilisateur pour sélectionner et afficher les certificats X.509.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectionFlag" /> parameter is not a valid flag.
The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is invalid.
A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
The title of the dialog box.
A descriptive message to guide the user.
The message is displayed in the dialog box.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag" /> values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.
A handle to the parent window to use for the display dialog box.
Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection using a handle to a parent window.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A> method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A> méthode si vous avez besoin aux utilisateurs de sélectionner manuellement les certificats X.509 à l’aide d’une boîte de dialogue.

trans-unit.source: If no user interaction is required, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Si aucune interaction utilisateur n’est requise, utilisez le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectionFlag" /> parameter is not a valid flag.
The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="certificates" /> parameter is invalid.
requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requiert une confiance totale pour l’appelant immédiat.
